process_sentence[source]

process_sentence(doc_id:int, sent_id:int, sent_tokens:list, sent_pos:list, raw_sent:str)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Pre-process a single document

decontracted[source]

decontracted(text:str)

Removes contractions from input text.

Credit: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/19790188/expanding-english-language-contractions-in-python

Returns str

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_stop_words[source]

get_stop_words(stop_words_file:str=None)

Gets a list of all stop words

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

token_filter[source]

token_filter(token:str, stop_words:list)

Checks if a token should be kept (True) or removed during pre-processing (i.e stop words, non-alpha tokens)

Returns bool

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_tokens[source]

get_tokens(text:string)

Gets list of tokens from string

Returns list

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

tokenize_and_stem[source]

tokenize_and_stem(text:str, stop_words:list)

Parse out sentences, remove contractions, tokenize by white space, remove all punctuation, lemmatize tokens, and get parts of speech.

Returns (list, list, list)

{% endraw %}
